parameters.name: K8sClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the cluster on the data plane. If you specify this parameter, you cannot specify ServiceMeshId. This parameter and ServiceMeshId cannot be left empty at the same time.

parameters.name: LbType
parameters.description:
Load balancer type, value:

* `clb`: Classic Load Balancer

* `nlb`: Network Load Balancer

default is `clb`.

parameters.name: NetworkType
parameters.description:
The network type of the SLB instance. Valid values:

*   `intranet`
*   `internet`

parameters.name: ServiceMeshId
parameters.description: The ID of the Service Mesh (ASM) instance. If you specify this parameter, you cannot specify K8sClusterId. This parameter and K8sClusterId cannot be left empty at the same time.
